title: 84/353/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 June 1984 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1984 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 June 1984
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1984 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/353/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy submitted by the Italian Government for 1984 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 June 1984.
For the Commission
Richard BURKE
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 195, 18. 7. 1981, p. 48.
